Advani became president of the BJP in 1986, the RSS decided to place its members in important positions within the BJP; Modis work during the Ahmedabad election led to his selection for this role, and Modi was elected organising secretary of the BJPs Gujarat unit later in 1987.Modi rose within the party and was named a member of the BJPs National Election Committee in 1990, helping organise L.
